messages.content: To install pfaeff-comfyui, you need to clone the repository `https://github.com/Pfaeff/pfaeff-comfyui.git` into `ComfyUI/custom_nodes/` and restart ComfyUI. Installation of dependencies should happen automatically.
Has the installation of pfaeff-comfyui been tested?
The installation of pfaeff-comfyui is marked as 'not tested, yet', indicating that it has not been thoroughly tested for compatibility or issues.
What types of image workflows are provided by pfaeff-comfyui?
pfaeff-comfyui provides SDXL pixel art example workflows, specifically 'SDXL Pixelart workflow with background removal' and 'Aspect ratio preserving SDXL Pixelart workflow'.
How do I use the provided image workflows in pfaeff-comfyui?
To use the provided image workflows in pfaeff-comfyui, simply drag one of the images into ComfyUI after the installation is complete.
What is the purpose of the 'SDXL Pixelart workflow with background removal' workflow?
The 'SDXL Pixelart workflow with background removal' workflow process involves removing the background from pixel art generated by SDXL.
What is the 'Aspect ratio preserving SDXL Pixelart workflow' used for?
The 'Aspect ratio preserving SDXL Pixelart workflow' workflow ensures that the aspect ratio of the original pixel art is preserved during the generation process.
